name: named-logs-console
description: console logger using named-logs facade for minimal lib overhead with full control
author: Ronan Sandford

scripts.prepare: node .setup.js && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.build:umd: rimraf dist/umd && tsc -p tsconfig-umd.json && terser dist/umd/index.js -c -m -o dist/umd/index.js
scripts.build:script-tag: rimraf dist/script-tag && tsc -p tsconfig-script-tag.json && terser dist/script-tag/index.js -c -m -o dist/script-tag/index.js
